search_query: FICO Fair Isaac competitors 2015 predictive analytics
context: By 2015, FICO remained the dominant player in credit scoring with 90% market share, but the competitive landscape was evolving. VantageScore 3.0 (released in 2013) had adopted FICO's 300-850 scale, making it easier for lenders to adopt. FICO's primary competitors were still the credit bureaus through VantageScore, but the company also faced increasing competition in its broader analytics and decision management software business from major enterprise software vendors. The predictive analytics market was becoming more crowded with specialized vendors offering alternatives to FICO's solutions.

competitors.name: VantageScore Solutions
competitors.notes: Credit bureaus' scoring alternative gaining traction; VantageScore 3.0 (2013) aligned with FICO's scale and could score consumers with limited credit histories

competitors.name: Equifax
competitors.notes: Credit bureau competing through VantageScore ownership and proprietary analytics solutions while maintaining partnership with FICO

competitors.name: Experian
competitors.notes: Major credit reporting agency offering VantageScore and proprietary scoring models, plus fraud detection and analytics platforms

competitors.name: TransUnion
competitors.notes: Credit bureau co-owning VantageScore and developing competing credit scoring and risk analytics solutions

competitors.name: Pega
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in decision management software, offering customer engagement and business process automation platforms

competitors.name: SAS Institute
competitors.notes: Leading analytics software provider competing in predictive analytics, credit risk, and advanced analytics solutions

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise technology company offering competing analytics platforms including SPSS Modeler and Cognos for decision management

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Software giant providing enterprise analytics, business intelligence, and decision support systems

competitors.name: RapidMiner
competitors.notes: Predictive analytics platform emerging as alternative to FICO's analytics software

competitors.name: Alteryx
competitors.notes: Data analytics company offering self-service data blending and advanced analytics platform

competitors.name: In-house Bank Models
competitors.notes: Large financial institutions maintaining custom-built credit scoring and risk models as alternatives to FICO
